requiredEquipmentExplanation: The metadata for this workout video explicitly states in both the title and description that no equipment is needed: "Gentle Pilates Workout with Guided Breathing | At Home | No equipment | 20 Mins" and "Enjoy this 20 minute full body Pilates workout you can do at home, no equipment needed...". Additionally, the Pilates practice, as described through the tags and comments, focuses on guided breathing and gentle movements, typical of bodyweight-only routines. There is no mention of any specific equipment in the comments or tags that would contradict the no-equipment claim. Therefore, it is concluded with very high confidence that this workout is designed to be performed without any additional equipment.
